option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?import javafx.geometry.Insets?> <?import javafx.scene.control.Hyperlink?> <?import javafx.scene.control.Label?> <?import javafx.scene.control.ScrollPane?> <?import javafx.scene.image.Image?> <?import javafx.scene.image.ImageView?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.BorderPane?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.HBox?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.Region?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.VBox?> <?import javafx.scene.text.Font?> <?import javafx.scene.text.Text?>
<BorderPane fx:id="mainBorderPane" maxHeight="-Infinity" maxWidth="-Infinity" minHeight="-Infinity" minWidth="-Infinity" prefHeight="700.0" prefWidth="1000.0" xmlns="http://javafx.com/javafx/23.0.1" xmlns:fx="http://javafx.com/fxml/1" fx:controller="com.example.demo5.AboutController"> <top> <!-- Navbar will be loaded dynamically in controller --> </top> <center> <AnchorPane prefHeight="200.0" prefWidth="200.0" style="-fx-background-color: #f5f5f5;" BorderPane.alignment="CENTER"> <children> <VBox alignment="TOP_CENTER" prefHeight="620.0" prefWidth="1000.0" AnchorPane.bottomAnchor="0.0" AnchorPane.leftAnchor="0.0" AnchorPane.rightAnchor="0.0" AnchorPane.topAnchor="0.0"> <padding> <Insets top="80.0" /> </padding> <children> <Label alignment="CENTER" prefHeight="70.0" prefWidth="347.0" text="About MediTrack" textFill="#449b6d"> <font> <Font name="System Bold" size="24.0" /> </font> <VBox.margin> <Insets top="10.0" /> </VBox.margin> </Label> <ScrollPane fitToWidth="true" prefHeight="600.0" prefWidth="1000.0" style="-fx-background-color: transparent;"> <content> <VBox alignment="TOP_CENTER" spacing="20.0"> <padding> <Insets bottom="20.0" left="20.0" right="20.0" top="10.0" /> </padding> <children> <HBox alignment="CENTER" prefHeight="220.0" prefWidth="980.0" spacing="30.0"> <children> <ImageView fitHeight="200.0" fitWidth="300.0" pickOnBounds="true" preserveRatio="true"> <image> <Image url="@../../../images/doctor.png" /> </image> </ImageView> <VBox alignment="CENTER_LEFT" prefHeight="200.0" prefWidth="550.0" spacing="15.0"> <children> <Label text="Your Health, Our Priority" textFill="#633364"> <font> <Font name="System Bold" size="20.0" /> </font> </Label> <Text strokeType="OUTSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" text="MediTrack is a modern pharmacy committed to providing high-quality healthcare products and services to our community. Founded in 2020, we've been delivering reliable, affordable medications to customers worldwide." wrappingWidth="550.0"> <font> <Font size="14.0" /> </font> </Text> <Text strokeType="OUTSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" text="Our team of experienced pharmacists is dedicated to ensuring you receive the right medications with proper guidance on their usage. We believe in building a healthier community through accessible healthcare solutions." wrappingWidth="550.0"> <font> <Font size="14.0" /> </font> </Text> </children> </VBox> </children> <padding> <Insets bottom="10.0" left="10.0" right="10.0" top="10.0" /> </padding> </HBox> <VBox alignment="TOP_CENTER" prefHeight="280.0" prefWidth="980.0" spacing="15.0"> <children> <Label text="Our Services" textFill="#449b6d"> <font> <Font name="System Bold" size="20.0" /> </font> </Label> <HBox alignment="CENTER" prefHeight="80.0" prefWidth="980.0" spacing="40.0"> <children> <VBox alignment="TOP_CENTER" prefHeight="80.0" prefWidth="300.0" style="-fx-background-color: white; -fx-background-radius: 10px; -fx-effect: dropshadow(three-pass-box, rgba(0,0,0,0.1), 10, 0, 0, 10);"> <children> <Label text="Prescription Filling" textFill="#633364"> <font> <Font name="System Bold" size="16.0" /> </font> </Label> <Text strokeType="OUTSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" text="Quick and accurate filling of prescriptions with options for home delivery." textAlignment="CENTER" wrappingWidth="280.0"> <font> <Font size="14.0" /> </font> </Text> </children> <padding> <Insets bottom="10.0" left="10.0" right="10.0" top="10.0" /> </padding> </VBox> <VBox alignment="TOP_CENTER" prefHeight="80.0" prefWidth="300.0" style="-fx-background-color: white; -fx-background-radius: 10px; -fx-effect: dropshadow(three-pass-box, rgba(0,0,0,0.1), 10, 0, 0, 10);"> <children> <Label text="Health Consultations" textFill="#633364"> <font> <Font name="System Bold" size="16.0" /> </font> </Label> <Text strokeType="OUTSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" text="Free consultations with our experienced pharmacists for medication guidance." textAlignment="CENTER" wrappingWidth="280.0"> <font> <Font size="14.0" /> </font> </Text> </children> <padding> <Insets bottom="10.0" left="10.0" right="10.0" top="10.0" /> </padding> </VBox> <VBox alignment="TOP_CENTER" prefHeight="80.0" prefWidth="300.0" style="-fx-background-color: white; -fx-background-radius: 10px; -fx-effect: dropshadow(three-pass-box, rgba(0,0,0,0.1), 10, 0, 0, 10);"> <children> <Label text="Health Products" textFill="#633364"> <font> <Font name="System Bold" size="16.0" /> </font> </Label> <Text strokeType="OUTSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" text="Wide range of wellness and healthcare products alongside medications." textAlignment="CENTER" wrappingWidth="280.0"> <font> <Font size="14.0" /> </font> </Text> </children> <padding> <Insets bottom="10.0" left="10.0" right="10.0" top="10.0" /> </padding> </VBox> </children> </HBox> <HBox alignment="CENTER" layoutX="20.0" layoutY="45.0" prefHeight="80.0" prefWidth="980.0" spacing="40.0"> <children> <VBox alignment="TOP_CENTER" prefHeight="80.0" prefWidth="300.0" style="-fx-background-color: white; -fx-background-radius: 10px; -fx-effect: dropshadow(three-pass-box, rgba(0,0,0,0.1), 10, 0, 0, 10);"> <children> <Label text="Health Monitoring" textFill="#633364"> <font> <Font name="System Bold" size="16.0" /> </font> </Label> <Text strokeType="OUTSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" text="Regular health checks including blood pressure, glucose levels, and cholesterol." textAlignment="CENTER" wrappingWidth="280.0"> <font> <Font size="14.0" /> </font> </Text> </children> <padding> <Insets bottom="10.0" left="10.0" right="10.0" top="10.0" /> </padding> </VBox> <VBox alignment="TOP_CENTER" prefHeight="80.0" prefWidth="300.0" style="-fx-background-color: white; -fx-background-radius: 10px; -fx-effect: dropshadow(three-pass-box, rgba(0,0,0,0.1), 10, 0, 0, 10);"> <children> <Label text="Medication Management" textFill="#633364"> <font> <Font name="System Bold" size="16.0" /> </font> </Label> <Text strokeType="OUTSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" text="Assistance with managing complex medication schedules for chronic conditions." textAlignment="CENTER" wrappingWidth="280.0"> <font> <Font size="14.0" /> </font> </Text> </children> <padding> <Insets bottom="10.0" left="10.0" right="10.0" top="10.0" /> </padding> </VBox> <VBox alignment="TOP_CENTER" prefHeight="80.0" prefWidth="300.0" style="-fx-background-color: white; -fx-background-radius: 10px; -fx-effect: dropshadow(three-pass-box, rgba(0,0,0,0.1), 10, 0, 0, 10);"> <children> <Label text="Online Services" textFill="#633364"> <font> <Font name="System Bold" size="16.0" /> </font> </Label> <Text strokeType="OUTSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" text="Easy online ordering, prescription refills, and virtual consultations." textAlignment="CENTER" wrappingWidth="280.0"> <font> <Font size="14.0" /> </font> </Text> </children> <padding> <Insets bottom="10.0" left="10.0" right="10.0" top="10.0" /> </padding> </VBox> </children> </HBox> </children> <padding> <Insets bottom="10.0" left="10.0" right="10.0" top="10.0" /> </padding> </VBox> <VBox alignment="TOP_CENTER" prefHeight="100.0" prefWidth="980.0" spacing="10.0"> <children> <Label text="Contact Us" textFill="#449b6d"> <font> <Font name="System Bold" size="20.0" /> </font> </Label> <Text strokeType="OUTSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" text=" 123 Health Street, Medical District, City" textAlignment="CENTER" wrappingWidth="980.0"> <font> <Font size="14.0" /> </font> </Text> <Text layoutX="20.0" layoutY="64.0" strokeType="OUTSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" text=" +1 (555) 123-4567" textAlignment="CENTER" wrappingWidth="980.0"> <font> <Font size="14.0" /> </font> </Text> <Text layoutX="20.0" layoutY="82.0" strokeType="OUTSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" text="✉️ contact@meditrack.com" textAlignment="CENTER" wrappingWidth="980.0"> <font> <Font size="14.0" /> </font> </Text> </children> </VBox>
<!-- Footer Section --> <HBox alignment="CENTER" prefHeight="120.0" prefWidth="980.0" style="-fx-background-color: linear-gradient(to right, #449b6d, #633364);"> <children> <VBox alignment="CENTER" prefHeight="120.0" prefWidth="300.0"> <children> <Label text="MediTrack" textFill="WHITE"> <font> <Font name="System Bold" size="18.0" /> </font> </Label> <Label text="Your health, our priority" textFill="WHITE"> <font> <Font size="12.0" /> </font> </Label> <ImageView fitHeight="40.0" fitWidth="40.0" pickOnBounds="true" preserveRatio="true"> <image> <Image url="@../../../images/stetho.png" /> </image> <VBox.margin> <Insets top="10.0" /> </VBox.margin> </ImageView> </children> </VBox>
<Region prefHeight="120.0" prefWidth="40.0" />
<VBox alignment="CENTER" prefHeight="120.0" prefWidth="300.0"> <children> <Label text="Quick Links" textFill="WHITE"> <font> <Font name="System Bold" size="14.0" /> </font> <VBox.margin> <Insets bottom="5.0" /> </VBox.margin> </Label> <Hyperlink onAction="#navigateToHome" style="-fx-text-fill: #ffffff;" text="Home" /> <Hyperlink onAction="#navigateToProducts" style="-fx-text-fill: #ffffff;" text="Products" /> <Hyperlink style="-fx-text-fill: #ffffff;" text="About" /> </children> </VBox>
<Region prefHeight="120.0" prefWidth="40.0" />
<VBox alignment="CENTER" prefHeight="120.0" prefWidth="300.0"> <children> <Label text="Contact Us" textFill="WHITE"> <font> <Font name="System Bold" size="14.0" /> </font> <VBox.margin> <Insets bottom="5.0" /> </VBox.margin> </Label> <Label text="Email: contact@meditrack.com" textFill="WHITE"> <font> <Font size="12.0" /> </font> </Label> <Label text="Phone: +1 (555) 123-4567" textFill="WHITE"> <font> <Font size="12.0" /> </font> </Label> <Label text="Address: 123 Health Street" textFill="WHITE"> <font> <Font size="12.0" /> </font> </Label> </children> </VBox> </children> <VBox.margin> <Insets top="20.0" /> </VBox.margin> </HBox>
<!-- Copyright Section --> <HBox alignment="CENTER" prefHeight="40.0" prefWidth="980.0" style="-fx-background-color: #2c3e50;"> <children> <Label text="© 2025 MediTrack. All Rights Reserved." textFill="WHITE"> <font> <Font size="12.0" /> </font> </Label> </children> </HBox> </children> </VBox> </content> <VBox.margin> <Insets bottom="10.0" left="10.0" right="10.0" /> </VBox.margin> </ScrollPane> </children> </VBox> </children> </AnchorPane> </center> </BorderPane>
